title: kANbadennALO
sahitya:
kAnbadennALO karuNaiyAna kaDavuL anbaip-
puNbadennALO jyOti pularvadennALO


anupallavi

  AN peNNADalAna ulagil AshA-pAsha nAsha valaiyil 
vIN mayakkil vizhundu vizhundu vizhalukk-iraittiDAdu vAzhvaik-


caraNam    avalai eNNI umaiyai iDikkum avala manadinai angumingum
alaindiDAmal anbilE irutti savalaik-kuzhandai pOlun maDiyil
tavazhndu vandun shuddha shakti amizhdamuNDu 
mArip-pirandu anavaratam un ninaivadAgik-
